amendment.description: Page 267, line 23, after the dollar amount, insert "(increased by $1,000,000)". Page 273, line 1, after the dollar amount, insert "(decreased by $1,000,000)".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bergman amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bergman amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Bergman.
